hero.title: Game Hosting
hero.description: Fast, reliable, and secure hosting for your gaming communities. Launch dedicated servers with instant setup, DDoS protection, and 24/7 support.

stats.uptimeDesc: Enterprise redundancy keeping your servers online.
stats.supportDesc: Expert help with installs, mods, and server ops.

features.title: Built for
features.description: Enterprise-grade infrastructure with gamer-friendly tooling. Instant servers, low-latency routing, and powerful controls.

ddos.title: DDoS Protection
ddos.description: Enterprise-grade mitigation powered by FyfeWeb with automatic scrubbing to keep servers online under attack.

latency.title: Low Latency Network
latency.description: Optimized routes through FyfeWeb's UK network with London POPs for minimal ping.

setup.title: Instant Setup
setup.description: One-click server templates, automated mod installs, and fast provisioning.

locations.title: UK Data Centers
locations.description: Strategically located in the UK with London POPs powered by FyfeWeb.

panel.title: Control Panel
panel.description: A powerful UI for console access, file management, backups, and metrics.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Human-first support with expert ops available any time, for installs and troubleshooting.

about.title: Built by Gamers,
about.paragraph1: NodeByte started as a small group of gamers and ops engineers who wanted hosting that was fast, reliable, and easy to manage. We've experienced the frustration of laggy servers and unresponsive support firsthand.
about.paragraph2: That's why we built infrastructure tuned specifically for multiplayer gaming: low latency routing, robust DDoS protection, and instant server provisioning so you can get playing fast.

players.title: Built for Players
players.description: Our infrastructure prioritizes low latency routing, predictable performance, and strong uptime so your communities stay online and responsive.

community.title: Community & Mod Support
community.description: Seamless mod installs, snapshot support, and community tooling to help you run modded worlds and persistent servers with minimal effort.

open.title: Open by Design
open.description: We value transparency from clear SLA commitments to open tooling. Our platform provides APIs and integrations to automate server workflows.

pricing.title: Server Plans
pricing.description: Flexible plans to match your needs. All plans include DDoS protection, instant setup, and 24/7 support.
pricing.comingSoonDescription: We're working on bringing you the best hosting experience. Join our Discord to be notified when we launch!
pricing.customSolution: Need a custom solution or have questions?

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Quick answers about NodeByte hosting, performance, and support.
faq.noResults: No results found. Try searching for "DDoS", "mods", or "SLA".
faq.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

provision.question: How fast can I provision a server?
provision.answer: Most prebuilt server templates provision in under 60 seconds. Custom setups with large mods may take longer depending on mod install time.

ddos.question: Do you offer DDoS protection?
ddos.answer: Yes, all plans include enterprise-grade DDoS mitigation powered by FyfeWeb. Our London POPs provide automatic filtering and scrubbing at the network edge.

locations.question: Where are your data centers located?
locations.answer: We operate UK-based data centers with London POPs powered by our network partner FyfeWeb, providing excellent coverage across the UK and Europe.

mods.question: Can I run mods and custom maps?
mods.answer: Yes, our control panel and templates support common mod loaders (Forge, Fabric) and custom map uploads. Managed mod support is available on selected plans.

uptime.question: What is your uptime SLA?
uptime.answer: We offer a 99.6% uptime SLA on production plans. See our terms for details and eligibility criteria.

trial.question: Can I get a trial before committing?
trial.answer: Yes, we offer free trials for new users to test our services before making a commitment. Visit our free trial page to see available options.

games.title: Choose Your
games.description: Powerful, low-latency game servers. Instant setup, intuitive control panel, and 24/7 expert support.
games.customSolution: Need a game server that's not listed?

minecraft.description: Java & Bedrock servers with one click mod loaders, plugins, and full version support.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: Perfect for small servers and testing

modLoaders.title: One-Click Mod Loaders
modLoaders.description: Install Forge, Fabric, Paper, Spigot, and more with a single click from our control panel.

hardware.title: High Performance Hardware
hardware.description: Enterprise grade AMD Ryzen processors with NVMe storage for blazing fast performance.

ddos.title: DDoS Protection
ddos.description: Enterprise grade DDoS mitigation powered by FyfeWeb keeps your server online even during attacks.

instant.title: Instant Setup
instant.description: Your server is deployed within seconds. Start playing immediately after purchase.

ftp.title: Full FTP Access
ftp.description: Complete file access via FTP/SFTP. Upload worlds, plugins, and configurations with ease.

slots.title: Unlimited Slots
slots.description: No artificial player limits. Host as many players as your hardware can handle.

versions.question: What Minecraft versions do you support?
versions.answer: We support all Minecraft versions from 1.7.10 to the latest release, including snapshots. Both Java Edition and Bedrock Edition servers are available.

mods.question: Can I install mods and plugins?
mods.answer: Yes! We support all major mod loaders including Forge, Fabric, and NeoForge. For plugins, we support Paper, Spigot, Bukkit, and Purpur. You can also upload custom JARs.

upload.question: How do I upload my existing world?
upload.answer: You can upload your world files via our web-based file manager or through SFTP. Simply drag and drop your world folder and it will be ready to use.

playerLimit.question: Is there a player limit?
playerLimit.answer: No, we don't impose artificial player limits. Your server can host as many players as your allocated resources can handle.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
upgrade.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from our billing panel. Changes take effect immediately with no downtime.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Yes, we offer a 48-hour money-back guarantee on all new purchases. If you're not satisfied, contact support for a full refund.

rust.description: High-performance Rust server hosting with Oxide/uMod support and custom map options.

oxide.title: Oxide/uMod Support
oxide.description: Full support for Oxide and uMod plugins. Install and manage plugins directly from our control panel.

maps.title: Custom Maps
maps.description: Use procedurally generated maps or upload your own custom maps. Full map customization support.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: Rust demands powerful hardware. Our servers use the latest AMD Ryzen CPUs and NVMe storage.

ddos.title: DDoS Protection
ddos.description: FyfeWeb's enterprise-grade DDoS mitigation through UK London POPs protects your server from attacks 24/7.

wipe.title: Wipe Scheduler
wipe.description: Automated wipe scheduling to keep your server fresh. Configure weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly wipes.

rcon.title: Full RCON Access
rcon.description: Complete remote console access for server management. Execute commands from anywhere.

oxide.question: Do you support Oxide/uMod plugins?
oxide.answer: Yes! We fully support Oxide and uMod. You can install Oxide with one click from our control panel and manage plugins through our plugin manager or via FTP.

maps.question: Can I use custom maps?
maps.answer: Absolutely! You can use procedurally generated maps with custom seeds and sizes, or upload your own custom map files via FTP.

wipe.question: How does the wipe scheduler work?
wipe.answer: Our wipe scheduler lets you automate server wipes on a schedule you choose. You can configure map-only wipes or full blueprint wipes, and optionally send Discord notifications.

tickRate.question: What's the server tick rate?
tickRate.answer: Our Rust servers run at the default 30 tick rate. Our high-performance hardware ensures consistent performance even with many players online.

rcon.question: Can I access RCON?
rcon.answer: Yes, you get full RCON access. You can use our web-based RCON console or connect with any standard RCON client.

modded.question: Do you support modded servers?
modded.answer: Yes, we support both vanilla and modded Rust servers. Install Oxide and add any plugins you need to create your perfect modded experience.

gamesPage.title: Game Server Hosting
gamesPage.description: High-performance game server hosting with instant setup, powerful control panel, and 24/7 expert support.

hero.title: Built by Gamers,
hero.description: NodeByte started as a small group of gamers and ops engineers who wanted hosting that was fast, reliable, and easy to manage. Today, we power game servers worldwide.

story.title: How It All Started
story.paragraph1: NodeByte was born from frustration. As avid gamers ourselves, we experienced firsthand the pain of laggy servers, unresponsive support, and complex control panels that made server management a nightmare.
story.paragraph2: In 2024, we decided enough was enough. We assembled a team of passionate gamers and experienced ops engineers with one goal: build the game hosting platform we always wished existed.
story.paragraph3: Today, NodeByte powers game servers across the globe. But our mission remains the same: make game server hosting fast, reliable, and accessible to everyone.

values.title: What We
values.description: Our core values guide everything we do, from infrastructure decisions to customer support.

players.title: Built for Players
players.description: Our infrastructure prioritizes low latency routing, predictable performance, and strong uptime so your communities stay online and responsive.

community.title: Community & Mod Support
community.description: Seamless mod installs, snapshot support, and community tooling to help you run modded worlds and persistent servers with minimal effort.

open.title: Open by Design
